price: "Por certo, é de Salomão. E, por certo, assim é: 'Em nome de Allah, O Misericordioso, O Misericordiador,
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: innahu min sulaymāna wa-innahu bis'mi al-lahi al-raḥmāni al-raḥīmi
